org.apache.velocity.runtime.log
Interface LogSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
AvalonLogSystem, Log4JLogSystem, NullLogSystem, PrimordialLogSystem, SimpleLog4JLogSystem
Deprecated. Use LogChute instead! 

public interface LogSystem

Old base interface that old logging systems needed to implement.

Version:
$Id: LogSystem.java 463298 2006-10-12 16:10:32Z henning $
Author:
Jon S. Stevens, Geir Magnusson Jr.
